live_updates: Work to restore services in the area continues. Thank you for your patience. A further update will be provided at 07:11 PT. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
58926.summary: Some customers in the East Clayton area of Surrey are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
58926.title: Mar 12 - Surrey (East Clayton) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
